title: innamum umadu
sahitya:
innamum umadu nenjam iLagavillaiyA en maghaL varuttamum umak-keTTavillaiyA


anupallavi

  kannalil inippup-pOl kalandu nirkkumOr karuNai vaLLal avaL tuyargaL kANavillaiyA


caraNam 1    nETravan vaLartta tattai nAthA enrE nINDa kuralil kUviyalara naindu vIzhndiTTAn 
AtroNAda kAdalAl nI allal koNDanai arum shirai viDuttEn enru adaiyum pOkkinAn
    caraNam 2    ummaiyE ninainden peNNum urugi vADurAL Unurakkam-onrumillai uyirttu vimmurAL 
kommai koTTi-yambalattil kUttaiyADu nar gOmaghanE anbu sheidu kuraigaL pOkkuvAi
